titles.title: Stop Online Opioid Sales Act of 2018

To require the Administrator of the Drug Enforcement Administration to make publicly available on the website of the Drug Enforcement Administration a report on the sale of controlled substances and controlled substance analogues by means of the Internet.
Stop Online Opioid Sales Act of 2018

bill.summary:
Stop Online Opioid Sales Act of 2018
This bill requires the Drug Enforcement Administration to publish annually on its website a report on the Internet sale of controlled substances and controlled substance analogues.
